blood-pact.hint: At the start of each of your turns, if your current hit point value is greater than 1, suffer %game.damage:1%.

supply_tokens.hint: Gain 1 Supply Token (10 supplies) at the start of the scenario, as well as during each rest (with Perk 11).

am.demons-4: reveal the top card of the monster ability deck
am.merchant-guild-4: after this attack ability grant one ally: %game.action.move% 2
am.military-4: create one %game.damage:2% tap in an empty hex adjacent to the target

angry-face.10: After moving for the first time each round, add +2 %game.action.attack% to all attacks for the round.
angry-face.2: Grant one of your summons adjacent to the target: %game.action.attack% +0
angry-face.3: At the start of each scenario, reveal the top card of each monster ability card deck in the scenario
angry-face.4: Whenever you long rest, after you %game.card.recover% your cards from your discard pile, you may play one card from your hand to perform a %data.action.custom.gh2e-doom% action of the card
angry-face.5: On each of your summons' turns, you may have them skip their turn and instead perform %game.action.move% +0 treating you as their focus
angry-face.7: In a single round, you and one of your summons must perform a combined total of 6 or more attack abilities

circles.1: After the attack ability, grant one of your summons: %game.action.teleport% 2
circles.10: All allies within %game.action.range% 3 gain %game.action.retaliate% 1 %game.action.range% 3 while %game.element.fire% is strong or waning.
circles.3: At the beginning of each round in which you long rest, all your summons gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the round
circles.4: Once each scenario, during your turn, %game.action.teleport% one of your summons to an empty hex adjacent to you
circles.5: Once each scenario, during ordering of initiative, after all ability cards have been revealed, all your summons gain %game.condition.invisible%
circles.6: Perform 3 different summon actions before your first rest and keep those cards in your active area for the entire scenario
circles.7: Perform 6 different summon abilities from your ability cards over the course of the first rounds of 6 scenarios
circles.8: At end of turn, grant one ally within %game.action.range% 3: %game.action.shield% 1

crossed-swords.1: Add +1 %game.action.attack% for each card with a %game.card.lost% in %game.characterIcon.envx%'s active area
crossed-swords.11: All adjacent enemies add -1 %game.action.attack% to all their attacks.
crossed-swords.12: All adjacent summons add +1 %game.action.attack% to all their attacks.
crossed-swords.13: Add +2 %game.action.attack% if the target is adjacent to any of your allies.
crossed-swords.14: Add %game.condition.disarm% if the target has any negative conditions.
crossed-swords.2: Whenever you long rest, you may %game.action.teleport% to a hex occupied by one of your summons and simultaneously %game.action.teleport% that summon to the hex you occupied
crossed-swords.3: Once each scenario, when you perform an action with %game.card.lost%, you may immediately play one card from your hand to perform an action with %game.card.lost% of the card
crossed-swords.4: You may additionally bring four %game.itemSlot:onehand% items, two %game.itemSlot:twohand% items, or two %game.itemSlot:onehand% items and one %game.itemSlot:twohand% item into each scenario.
crossed-swords.5: Perform 6 different %game.card.persistent%%game.card.lost% abilities with no more than 3 of the 6 being summon abilities
crossed-swords.6: Gain this mastery when you feel you deserve it
crossed-swords.7: X is the number of adjacent figures.
crossed-swords.8: At end of turn, grant all adjacent allies: %game.action.move:1%
crossed-swords.9: At end of turn, all adjacent allies and enemies suffer %game.action.damage:2%.

eclipse.1: After the attack ability, grant one adjacent ally or self: %game.action.teleport% 2
eclipse.2: If this attack kills the target, shuffle one %game.condition.curse% card into the monster attack modifier deck
eclipse.3: Place one %data.action.custom.gh2e-tear% in a hex adjacent to the target
eclipse.4: Whenever you long rest, you may %game.element.dark%
eclipse.5: Once each scenario, during your turn, place one %data.action.custom.gh2e-tear% in an adjacent hex
eclipse.6: If a %game.condition.curse% causes an enemy to deal no %game.damage% during its attack, that enemy suffers %game.damage:3%
eclipse.7: In a single scenario, infuse or consume %game.element.dark% during each of your turns
eclipse.8: In a single scenario, perform an attack ability during your turn in 5 consecutive rounds

lightning.2: Suffer %game.damage% equal to half your current hit point value (rounded down)
lightning.3: Whenever you heal from a long rest, add +1 %game.action.heal%
lightning.4: Once each scenario, when %game.damage% from an attack would reduce your current hit point value to less than 1, instead set your current hit point value to 1 and perform: %game.action.attack% 2, %game.action.target% the attacker
lightning.5: At the end of each of your turns, you may control all adjacent enemies: %game.action.attack% +0 %game.action.target% %game.characterIcon.lightning%
lightning.7: In a single scenario, end all your turns with your hit point value at half your maximum or lower without exhausting

music-note.1: Skip moving your character tokens on active %data.action.custom.gh2e-song% at the end of this round
music-note.3: At the end of each scenario, each character in that scenario gains %game.card.experience:8% if you completed your battle goal
music-note.4: Whenever you perform a %data.action.custom.gh2e-song%, if you have any unused Notes, gain one Note of your choice in addition to any other Note gained that round
music-note.5: During ordering of initiative in rounds in which you declare a long rest, gain one Note of your choice, and each of your allies may decrease their initiative by 10
music-note.6: In a single scenario, perform 7 different %data.action.custom.gh2e-song% actions
music-note.7: In a single scenario, create 20 or more Notes and use each Note you create in a %data.action.custom.gh2e-song%

351.1: At the end of each of your turns, grant the ally closest to you:

352.1: At the end of each of your turns, the enemy with the highest current hit point value suffers %game.damage:1% and gains %game.condition.muddle%.

353.1: At the end of each of your turns, the closest enemy to you that does not have %game.condition.disarm% or %game.condition.stun% gains %game.condition.disarm%.

354.1: You and each ally add +1%game.action.attack% to your first attack each turn.

355.1: At the end of each of your turns, perform:

356.1: At the end of this an your next five turns, gain one Note of your choice in addition to any other Note gained.

357.1: On your allies' next five attacks, add +X%game.action.attack% where X is the number of use slots the character token has passed (0, 1, 2, 3, 4).

366.1: At the end of each of your turns, perform:
366.2: Place your character token on a monster within %game.action.range:3%. At the end of that enemy's turn this round, remove your character token and that enemy gains %game.condition.disarm%.

367.1: You may immediately play up to three cards from your hand to perform one 1-Note %data.customAction:gh2e-song% action, one 2-Note %data.customAction:gh2e-song% action, and one 3-Note %data.customAction:gh2e-song% action, ignoring the Note requirements of those actions.

368.1: You and each ally may individually choose (after revealing the card) to treat the first attack modifier card drawn each turn as %game.attackmodifier.rolling%.
368.2: Force one enemy within %game.action.range:5% to perform
368.3: targeting another enemy with you controlling the action.

370.1: At the end of each of your turns, perform:

372.1: Immediately after you perform your first attack ability from your ability cards each round, you may repeat that attack ability, adding +1%game.action.attack% (you may choose a new target).

373.1: Control the target of the attach ability:

374.1: All enemies gain disadvantage on all their attacks.
374.2: Negate the next %game.damage% an ally within %game.action.range:2% would suffer this round.

376.1: You and each ally add %game.condition.wound% to your first attack each turn.

378.1: You and all allies gain %game.action.shield:1% and %game.action.retaliate:1% %game.action.range:2%.

379.1: Control all enemies moved through with the move ability:
379.2: Gain one Note of your choice in addition to any other Note you gain this round.
379.3: You may immediately play any number of cards from your hand and discard pile to perform %data.customAction:gh2e-song% actions of the cards, ignoring all Note requirements. Skip moving your character token on active %data.customAction:gh2e-song% this round.

380.1: At the end of each of your turns, perform:
380.2: Move you character tokens on each of your active %data.customAction:gh2e-song% abilities backward one slot.

saw.1: Give one adjacent ally or self one medical pack
saw.3: Add +1 %game.action.attack% if an ally has an active %data.action.custom.gh2e-prescription%
saw.4: Add +1 %game.action.heal% to all heal abilities on "Medical Pack" ability cards
saw.5: Each City Phase after completing a scenario, your or one ally's donation to the Sanctuary of the Great Oak is free
saw.6: At the end of each of your rests, if an ally as an active %data.action.custom.gh2e-prescription%, gain one "Medical Pack" ability card and move the token on one ally's active %data.action.custom.gh2e-prescription% backward one slot
saw.7: In a single scenario, give an ally a medical pack or %data.action.custom.gh2e-prescription% each round except when performing a long rest
saw.8: In a single scenario, never attack an undamaged enemy while there are any damaged monsters alive, and perform at least 10 attacks

squidface.1: Give the target or one enemy within %game.action.range% 2 of the target %game.condition.plague%
squidface.2: Give the target or one enemy within %game.action.range% 2 of the target %game.condition.poison%
squidface.4: Whenever you heal from a long rest, you may remove %game.condition.poison% from on ally to add +1 %game.action.heal%
squidface.5: Once each scenario, when an enemy that has a %game.condition.plague% would die, you first control that enemy and have it perform the abilities on its ability card, adding %game.condition.plague% to all its attack, then it dies
squidface.6: In a single turn, kill 3 or more enemies without drawing an attack modifier card
squidface.7: In a single scenario, either apply or remove %game.condition.poison% from an ally or enemy each round

sun.1: You or an adjacent ally may %game.card.recover% on level 1 card from the discard pile
sun.2: Whenever you open one or more doors during your turn, gain %game.action.shield% 1, %game.action.retaliate% 1 for the round
sun.3: Whenever you long rest, you may %game.element.light%
sun.4: Whenever one of your heals would cause an ally's hit point value to increase beyond their maximum hit point value, that ally gains %game.condition.ward%
sun.5: In a single scenario, infuse or consume %game.element.light% during each of your turns
sun.6: In a single scenario, deal 8 or more %game.damage% with an attack 3 or more times

three-spears.2: Gain the Barbed Strip or Iron Plate item
three-spears.3: Gain the Scroll of Relocation or Sharpened Dirk item
three-spears.4: You may bring one additional %game.itemSlot:small% item into each scenario
three-spears.5: Your party may purchase items from each faction as though the items' costs were five gold less and your reputation with that faction was two greater
three-spears.7: In a single scenario, spend 50 %data.action.custom.gh2e-supplies% to refresh 50 gold of lost items 3 times
three-spears.8: For an entire scenario, give yourself or an ally an item from the Quartermaster Item Supply each round except when performing a long rest

triangles.1: At the start of each scenario, you may %game.element.wild%
triangles.3: %game.element.fire%,%game.element.ice%,%game.element.air%, and %game.element.earth% do not wane at the end of each round
triangles.4: In a single scenario, consume 4 or more elements in a single turn 5 times
triangles.5: Once in 3 different scenarios, have all 6 elements strong or waning at the same time
triangles.6: Add +1 %game.action.attack% for each element that is strong or waning.

two-mini.1: Add +1 %game.action.attack% if the Wildfury and %data.action.custom.gh2e-bear-summon% are within %game.action.range% 4 of each other
two-mini.2: Whenever %data.action.custom.gh2e-bear-summon% is attacked, treat and %game.attackmodifier.double% attack modifier card the enemy draws as %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead
two-mini.3:
Once each scenario, during your turn, %data.action.custom.gh2e-command%: %game.action.move% 4.
If %data.action.custom.gh2e-bear-summon% exits a hex adjacent to you during this movement, you may %game.action.teleport% to an empty hex adjacent to %data.action.custom.gh2e-bear-summon% at the end of the movement
two-mini.4: At the start or end of each of your long rests, you may %game.elementHalf:air|earth% and reduce your current hit point value by X (X must be at least 1) to %data.action.custom.gh2e-command%: %game.action.heal% X, self
two-mini.5: In a single scenario, infuse or consume %game.element.air% or %game.element.earth% during each of your turns
two-mini.6: In a single scenario, kill 4 or more enemies with %data.action.custom.gh2e-command% attacks of 7 or greater (after all bonuses, before attack modifiers)
two-mini.7: All allies within %game.action.range% 3 add %game.action.pierce% 1 to all their attacks.
two-mini.9: All allies within %game.action.range% 3 add +2 %game.action.attack% to their first attack each round.

gh2e-10.1: During your ranged attack ability, gain advantage on one attack.

gh2e-100.1: After your next three turns during which you do not perform a move ability, flip this card over.
gh2e-100.2: During your move ability, add +2 %game.action.move% and flip this card over.

gh2e-101.1: During your turn, remove one negative condition you have. This item can be used while you have %game.condition.stun%.

gh2e-102.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield% 4 for the attack.

gh2e-103.1: During one of your summon's attack abilities, before drawing attack modifier cards, reveal the top two cards of your attack modifier deck. You may put any of them on the bottom of your deck.

gh2e-106.1: On the next five sources of %game.damage% from attacks targeting you, gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the attacks.

gh2e-107.1: Whenever you kill a monster, perform:

gh2e-108.1: During your turn, if you've killed an enemy this turn, perform:

gh2e-109.1: During your melee attack ability, add +2 %game.action.attack%, %game.action.pierce% 2 to all attacks.

gh2e-110.1: During your turn, add +1 %game.action.attack% to your next melee attack. If %game.element.fire% is strong or waning, all enemies adjacent to the target of that attack suffer %game.damage% 1.

gh2e-112.1: During your turn, destroy one trap within %game.action.range% 3. If an enemy is adjacent to that trap, you may instead spring the trap and apply its effects do that enemy.

gh2e-113.1: During your turn, place a character token on one normal or elite enemy within %game.action.range% 3. You and all allies add +1 %game.action.attack% to all attacks targeting this enemy.

gh2e-114.1: During your turn. add %game.action.jump% to your next move ability. If %game.element.air% is strong or waning also add +2 %game.action.move%.

gh2e-115.1: When an ally within %game.action.range% 3 would suffer %game.damage% you suffer the %game.damage% instead

gh2e-116.1: During your attack ability, you may gain disadvantage on one attack to flip this card over at the end of your turn.
gh2e-116.2: During an ally's attack ability, that ally gains advantage on one of their attacks and you flip this card over.

gh2e-117.1: During your turn, if %game.element.dark% is strong or waning add +1 %game.action.attack% to your next melee attack. If you brought Duskbrand %game.element.light%.

gh2e-118.1: During your turn if %game.element.light% is strong or waning add +1 %game.action.attack% to your next melee attack. If you brought Dawnblade %game.element.dark%.

gh2e-119.1: During your move ability, add +1 %game.action.move% and ignore difficult and hazardous terrain.

gh2e-12.1: During your turn, %game.card.recover% one level 1 card from your discard pile.

gh2e-121.2: If you brought Drakescale Boots and Drakescale Armor, add +1 %game.action.target%.

gh2e-128.1: During your turn, %game.card.recover% one of your lost %game.items.slots.small% items, and flip this card over.
gh2e-128.2: On your next three rests, gain %game.condition.curse%. After the third rest, flip this card over.

gh2e-129.1: When you are attacked, before drawing an attack modifier card, if %game.element.earth% is strong or waning, gain %game.condition.ward%.

gh2e-131.1: During your turn, if %game.element.ice% is strong or waning, perform either:

gh2e-132.1: During your turn, control one enemy within %game.action.range:5%.

gh2e-133.1: When you would be attacked by an adjacent normal enemy, instead control that enemy:

gh2e-135.1: During your turn, suffer %game.damage:4% or destroy an adjacent obstacle to have an enemy within %game.action.range:3% suffer %game.damage:4%.

gh2e-137.1: All monsters consider you to be last in initiative order when determining their focus.

gh2e-138.1: During melee attack ability, suffer %game.damage:2% to and add +1 %game.action.attack% to all attacks.

gh2e-139.1: When you perform a summon action, each summon summoned by that action gains %game.condition.ward%, %game.condition.invisible% and %game.condition.strengthen%.

gh2e-14.1: When you are attacked, before drawing an attack modifier card, the attacker gains disadvantage on the attack and you gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attack.

gh2e-142.1: During your move ability, add +1 %game.action.move% and create one 1-hex hazardous terrain tile in the featureless hex you end your movement occupying.

gh2e-143.1: During your ranged attack ability, gain %game.condition.immobilize% to add +1 %game.action.attack% to one attack.

gh2e-144.1: During ordering of initiative, after all ability cards have been revealed, order initiatives for the round from highest to lowest instead of lowest to highest.

gh2e-145.2: This movement must end adjacent to an obstacle or wall.

gh2e-146.1: This item must be brought into the scenario and is returned to the unavailable item supply at the end of the scenario.

gh2e-147.1: During your turn, if you do not have %game.condition.poison%, gain %game.condition.poison% to perform:

gh2e-148.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, negate the %game.damage% and infuse %game.element.light%

gh2e-149.1: This item may only be used if you are adjacent to at least one obstacle.

gh2e-15.1: When you use the basic bottom action of an ability card, perform %game.action.move% 3 instead of %game.action.move% 2.

gh2e-150.1: This item cannot be sold and must be brought into each scenario.
gh2e-150.2: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, you may suffer %game.damage:2% to have all adjacent allies and enemies suffer %game.damage:2%.

gh2e-151.1: During your melee attack ability, add %game.condition.wound%, %game.condition.poison% to all attacks.

gh2e-152.1: During your turn if, an ally within %game.action.range:3% has a negative condition, you may gain %game.condition.disarm% to remove one negative condition from that ally and give them %game.condition.safeguard%, %game.condition.bless%.

gh2e-17.1: During ordering of initiative, after all ability cards have been revealed, increase or decrease your initiative by 10.

gh2e-18.1: Whenever an enemy would give you  %game.condition.disarm%, %game.condition.stun% or %game.condition.muddle%, prevent the condition.

gh2e-19.1: When one of your summons suffers %game.damage% from an attack, that summon gains %game.action.shield:2% for the attack.

gh2e-2.1: During your movement, add %game.action.jump% to the movement.

gh2e-20.1: During your turn, add %game.action.pull:2% to all your ranged attacks.

gh2e-21.1: During your turn, add +1 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks.

gh2e-22.1: During your turn, one of your single-target melee attack abilities may target an enemy two hexes away.

gh2e-23.1: During your melee attack ability, add %game.condition.wound% to one attack.

gh2e-24.1: During your melee attack ability, add %game.condition.curse% to one attack.

gh2e-25.1: During your ranged attack ability, add %game.condition.immobilize% to one attack.

gh2e-26.1: During your attack ability, gain advantage on all attacks.

gh2e-27.1: When you are attacked, treat any %game.attackmodifier.double% attack modifier card the enemy draws as a %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.

gh2e-28.1: On the next three sources of %game.damage% from attacks targeting you, gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attacks.

gh2e-29.1: When an adjacent ally would be targeted by an attack, you are targeted instead, regardless of range and line-of-sight.

gh2e-3.1: On the next two sources of %game.damage% from attacks targeting you, gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attacks.

gh2e-30.1: During your turn, add %game.action.pierce:3% to all your ranged attacks.

gh2e-31.1: During your turn, grant one of your summons:

gh2e-32.2: All enemies that have %game.condition.muddle% add -1 %game.action.attack% to all their attacks this round.

gh2e-33.1: At the start of the scenario, remove one %game.attackmodifier.minus1% attack modifier card from your attack modifier deck.

gh2e-34.1: During your singe-target melee attack ability, change the targeting of the ability to:

gh2e-35.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:2% for the attack.

gh2e-36.1: When you short rest, %game.card.recover% up to three of your spent items.

gh2e-38.1: During your move ability, add +1 %game.action.move%. After the move ability, perform:

gh2e-4.1: When you are attacked, before drawing an attack modifier card, the attacker gains disadvantage on the attack.

gh2e-40.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, negate the %game.damage% and infuse %game.element.dark%.

gh2e-41.1: At the end of your move ability, grant one adjacent ally:

gh2e-42.1: After you move 4 or more hexes on your turn, after the move ability, perform:

gh2e-43.1: During your turn, add +1 %game.action.range% to all your ranged attacks.

gh2e-44.1: After your ranged attack ability, perform:
gh2e-44.2:
%game.action.target% 1 target of the attack
ability at any %game.action.range%, %game.action.pierce% 1

gh2e-46.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attack. After the attack but before any %game.action.retaliate%, perform:

gh2e-47.1: At the start of the scenario, bring one additional %game.items.slots.small% item.

gh2e-49.1: After you move 4 of more hexes on your turn, add +1 %game.action.attack% to your next melee attack this turn.

gh2e-5.1: During your attack ability, add %game.action.pierce% 1 to one attack.

gh2e-51.1: After you are attacked by an adjacent enemy, perform:

gh2e-52.1: When you short rest, %game.card.recover% up to three of your spent items and perform:

gh2e-53.1: During your turn, add +2 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks.

gh2e-54.1: After the next three attacks targeting an ally within %game.action.range:2% flip this card over.

gh2e-55.1: During your single-target ranged attack ability, change the targeting of the ability to:

gh2e-56.1: At the end of the turn, if you have moved 1 or fewer hexes during your turn, gain %game.action.shield:1% for the round.

gh2e-57.1: At the end of the turn, play one card from your hand perform all persistent and mandatory abilities on either the top or bottom action of the card.

gh2e-58.1: During your turn, %game.card.recover% one card from your discard pile.

gh2e-59.1: During your turn, add +2 %game.action.range% to all your ranged attacks.

gh2e-60.1: During your turn, %game.element.consume.wild% to add +1 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks.

gh2e-61.1: During your melee attack ability, add %game.condition.stun% to all attacks.

gh2e-63.1: When you short rest, %game.card.recover% up to three of your spent items, choose which card to lose during the rest, and perform:

gh2e-64.1: During your turn, %game.card.recover% one of your lost %game.items.slots.small% items.

gh2e-65.1: During your single-target melee attack ability, change the targeting of the ability to:

gh2e-67.1: When you use the basic bottom action of an ability card, you may perform %game.action.attack:3% instead of %game.action.move:2%.

gh2e-68.1: At the end of your turn, play one card from your hand and perform the bottom action of the card.

gh2e-69.1: On the next five sources of %game.damage% from attacks targeting you, gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attacks.

gh2e-7.1: During your melee attack ability, add %game.condition.poison% to one attack.

gh2e-70.1: Whenever you heal from a long rest, add +2 %game.action.heal%.

gh2e-71.1: During your ranged attack ability, add %game.condition.wound% to one attack. One enemy adjacent to that target and further from you than that target suffers %game.damage:2%.

gh2e-72.1: Allies gain advantage on the next three attacks performed while adjacent to you. Then flip this card over.
gh2e-72.2: After the next three attack abilities you perform while within %game.action.range:2% of one or more allies, flip this card over.

gh2e-73.1: During your turn, grant one of your summons:

gh2e-74.1: During your turn, place a character token on one adjacent enemy. At the start of each of the enemy's turns, they suffer %game.damage:1%. When that enemy dies, flip this card over.
gh2e-74.2: Place the character token in the hex in which the enemy died. You may loot that token to flip this card over.

gh2e-75.1: During your turn, grant one adjacent ally:

gh2e-76.1: Whenever you complete a scenario, gain 10 gold.

gh2e-77.1: During your attack ability, %game.element.consume.wild% to add +1 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks.

gh2e-78.1: During your melee attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and gain advantage on one attack. If this attack kills the target, after the attack perform:

gh2e-79.1: During your attack ability, add %game.condition.poison%, %game.condition.stun%, and %game.condition.curse% to one attack.

gh2e-8.1: When you suffer %game.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:1% for the attack.

gh2e-80.1: During your turn, %game.element.wild% and flip this card over at the end of your turn.
gh2e-80.2: When you kill a monster, flip this card over at the end of your turn.

gh2e-81.1: During your melee attack ability, %game.element.consume.ice% to add +2 %game.action.attack% to one attack.

gh2e-82.1: During your melee attack ability, %game.element.consume.air% to add +2 %game.action.attack% to one attack.

gh2e-83.1: During your melee attack ability, %game.element.consume.fire% to add +2 %game.action.attack% to one attack.

gh2e-84.1: During your melee attack ability, %game.element.consume.earth% to add +2 %game.action.attack% to one attack.

gh2e-85.1: During your melee attack ability, %game.element.consume.light% to add +2 %game.action.attack% to one attack.

gh2e-86.1: During your melee attack ability, %game.element.consume.dark% to add +2 %game.action.attack% to one attack.

gh2e-87.1: When you use the basic top action of an ability card, perform %game.action.attack:3% instead of %game.action.attack:2%.

gh2e-88.1: When you suffer %game.action.damage% from an attack, gain %game.action.shield:1% and %game.action.retaliate:2% for the attack.

gh2e-89.1: On the next three sources of %game.action.damage% from attacks targeting you, gain %game.action.shield:1%, %game.action.retaliate:1% for the attacks

gh2e-9.1: During your turn, if you've performed an action with %game.card.lost%, perform:

gh2e-90.2: This teleport must end in a hex adjacent to an enemy.

gh2e-91.1: During ordering of initiative, after all ability cards have been revealed, increase or decrease your initiative by 20.

gh2e-92.1: During your attack ability, add %game.condition.stun% to one attack.

gh2e-93.1: During your turn, grant one ally within %game.action.range:5%:

gh2e-95.1: When one ally within %game.action.range:5% suffers %game.action.damage% from an attack, grant them %game.action.shield:3% for the attack.

gh2e-96.1: During one ally within %game.action.range:5%'s move ability, add +1 %game.action.move% and %game.action.jump%.

gh2e-97.1: During your move ability, add +1 %game.action.move%. If you move 4 or more hexes and end on a money token or treasure tile with that move ability, gain %game.card.experience:1%.

gh2e-98.1: During your turn, designate the hex you are occupying and add %game.action.jump% to all your move abilities. At the end of your turn, %game.action.teleport% to the designated hex.
